availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abel B. Conant (Greenup County, Kentucky, physician and surgeon 7th Ky Vol Inf)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, physician. Ohio native. Married to Lilla Conant. Father of George H. Conant, Lewis Conant, and Zorah Conant. Physician in Lynn, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon and surgeon from September 1, 1862, to September 24, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Lynn, p. 722.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0211.
